overview: Hi! My self is Saroj Chauhan, I am a web designer and i have a creative ideas for Web Designing. I have above 3 year experience in Web Designing. I have good knowledge of Photo shop, Image Ready, Flash, Dream weaver, HTML/DHTML, CSS, Table less Design (Div), Microsoft Office and other designing tools. i am believe in truly creative and innovation while designing web pages. My work includes Building Websites with W3C Standards.
